name: Marketing Makeovers
tagline: THE MIDLAND'S FIRST WEB REDESIGN SPECIALIST.
description: The Midland's First Web Redesign Specialist As the only web redesign specialist in the Midlands, I have a real passion for turning around ineffective marketing. I work with business throughout the UK, providing innovative redesigns that attract, engage and inspire their target markets. I appreciate how competitive each industry is today and using a broad range of expertise, create bespoke design solutions that exceed competitor advertising and convert leads into sales.
